title: Introduction to Investment Types
description: A comprehensive exploration of fundamental investment vehicles including stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and ETFs, helping students understand how different investment types work, their risk-return characteristics, and how to select investments aligned with personal financial goals.
learning_objectives: Analyze the characteristics and functions of major investment types including stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and ETFs
Compare the risk-return profiles of different investment vehicles
Evaluate how different investment types align with various financial goals and time horizons
Calculate potential returns and assess risks associated with different investments
Make informed investment decisions based on personal financial situation and objectives

skill_builder.title: Investment Type Analyzer
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students explore different investment types, compare their characteristics, and build a sample investment portfolio aligned with specific financial goals and risk tolerance.
